title: 我们也买点医疗保险吧

conversations.english: Hey honey, how was your day?
conversations.reply_english: It was alright.I ran into Bill and we got to talking for a while.He’s in a bit of a jam.
conversations.reply_chinese: 还行。我碰见比尔了，我们说了会儿话。他现在有些困难。

conversations.english: Hey, John! I haven’t seen you for ages! What’s new? What have you been up to?
conversations.chinese: 你好，约翰，很长时间没肯定你了。有什么新状况？你忙什么呢？
conversations.reply_english: Pete! Nice to see you Well, on top the norm, you know, wife and kids and work, I’ve actually gotten into doing some trading.
conversations.reply_chinese: Pete!很高兴见到你。无非就是些寻常事，你知道的，妻子，孩子和工作。我已经开始真正做些交易了。

conversations.english: Hey, daughter, let me ask you something.
conversations.chinese: 嘿，女儿，我来问你一点事情。

conversations.english: I’ve just taken out an insurance policy. Are you insured?
conversations.chinese: 我刚买了份保险。你买保险了吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I am. I have life insurance and my home and its contents are also insured.
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗯，买了。我有人身保险，我家人还有家里的东西也都有保险。

title: 美国社会保险 Social security in the US

conversations.english: Well, that was an interesting documentary!
conversations.chinese: 那是个有意思的纪录片。
conversations.reply_english: For sure! I didn’t really understand some of the technical jargon they used in the film when they talked about social security in the US.
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然，我不明白影片中档他们谈到美国社会保险时提及的一些技术术语。

title: 社会保险保证老年生活

conversations.english: Man, they take a lot of our paycheck.
conversations.chinese: 嘿，他们从我的薪水里扣了不少钱哦。
conversations.reply_english: Yeah, the government really takes a bite, doesn’t it?
conversations.reply_chinese: 是呀，政府确实扣除不少。

conversations.english: What are your terms of sale?
conversations.reply_english: The price quoted is for CIF.

conversations.english: How are your stocks doing, Jim?
conversations.reply_english: Oh, all right. I lost a bunch of money in the last two years, but this year has been pretty good.
conversations.reply_chinese: 噢，还行。前两年我输了一大笔钱，但是今年一直都很好。

conversations.reply_english: Yes, I need some more cash for my visit in China. May I cash a traveler’s check here?
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我需要一些现金，在中国旅行时可以使用。我可以在这里兑换旅游支票吗？

conversations.english: When it comes to selecting a fund, you will always read Past performance is not an indication of future results, can you believe that?
conversations.chinese: 当谈到选择基金的时候，你总会听到“过去的成就并不代表它的将来”，你相信这句话吗？
conversations.reply_english: Maybe it is right since everything is possible. You know the market changes quickly these days. But I still have doubted those funds with bad stock performance. For me, his stock record is the very important criteria to decide which to buy. I really want to decrease the risk reach the minimum and achieve the maximum returns.
conversations.reply_chinese: 或许它是正确的，因为一切皆有可能。你知道的，现在的市场变化快速。但是我仍然对那些股票行情不佳的基金没有信心。对我来说，股票记录是我决定买哪一个的重要依据。我真的很想把风险降到最低，把回报提到最高。

conversations.english: Good afternoon Miss, would you be interested in buying more life insurance? You know, you can never get enough.
conversations.chinese: 下午好，小姐，你有兴趣再买一些人寿保险吗？你知道的，你从来都不能买够的。
conversations.reply_english: I think my husband has some.

title: 我想试着炒炒股 Buying stocks

conversations.english: Everyone wants to be financial lose kill. You must invest your savings if you planed to retire rich. I’m thinking about buying stocks. It can be a good investment if I can manage well. What do you say?
conversations.chinese: 每个人都想减少经济损失。如果你想退休时很富有，你就必须拿你的积蓄去投资。我想到了买股票。如果我能很好地管理它，它可能是一种很好的投资方式。你怎样认为呢？
conversations.reply_english: I partly agree with you. Buying stocks is not difficult, but making money consistently from buying stock is very difficult. Even professionals don’t find it easy, so be careful. Anyway, people like us need help with investing. Why not do some online research? There are data, reports and discussion forums to educate people on how to invest. In addition, you need to visit an established website that offers stock charts.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我部分同意你，买股票并不难，但是买股票一直赚钱就很难了。甚至是专业人士也觉得不容易，要如此小心。无论怎样，想我们这样的人需要投资方面的帮助。为什么不上网搜索呢？网上有数据，报告和论坛可以教人们如何投资。另外，你需要访问一个提供股票走势图的已建网站。

conversations.english: Well, that was an interesting documentary!
conversations.chinese: 那是个有意思的纪录片。
conversations.reply_english: For sure! I didn’t really understand some of the technical jargon they used in the film when they talked about social security in the US.
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然，我不明白影片中档他们谈到美国社会保险时提及的一些技术术语。

conversations.english: Good Morning, sir. What can I do for you?
conversations.chinese: 早上好，先生。请问有什么可以帮助您？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I'd like to change Australian dollars for RMB.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我想把澳元换成人民币。

conversations.chinese: 请问有什么可以帮助您的？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, can I cash my traveler's check here?
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我能在这儿兑换我的旅行支票吗？
